sentence.Network_en: This crew of robbers would suck me dry by driblets.
sentence.Network_cn: 这伙强盗要一点一滴地把我的财产榨干.

sentence.Network_en: The merchant could only pay the laborer in driblets.
sentence.Network_cn: 那商人只能零星地付给那工人工钱.

list.abs: 小双弓贝 Meristells小碎屑锥 driblet cone小索氏贝 Sowerbyella
dribble 滴下driblet 少许dribs and drabs 点滴
英语词缀 ... leaflet（ 传单）, driblet（ 一滴） asymmetric（ 不对称的）.

auth_sentence.content: These bits of information were imparted...in driblets and with caution.
auth_sentence.res_content: These bits of information were imparted...in driblets and with caution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These bits of information were imparted...in driblets and with caution.
